<think>

At [2-3], the character in the white sweater appears with the caption "Bring a friend!" This is the second caption.

At [4-5], both characters are at the entrance with the caption "Get your tickets early!" This is the third caption.

At [6-7], the character in the white sweater is at the concession stand with the captions "Grab some snacks!" and "(Carefully)" appearing sequentially. This adds two more captions, making it five captions in total.

Based on these observations, the captions appear five times throughout the video.
